price: Ibiri mu birere n’ibiri mu isi byose bisingiza Allah. Kandi (Allah) ni Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje, Nyirubugenge buhambaye.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
